meanings.sent1: The local subagencies help the main agency with smaller tasks.
meanings.sent2: The subagencies of the company handle different departments efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The subagencies decided to have a race to see who could finish their work first.
meanings.sent4: The subagencies are like the supporting actors in a play, crucial but often overlooked.
meanings.sent5: In the forest of organizations, the subagencies are the smaller trees that support the main trunk.

meanings.definition: A branch or division of a larger organization.
meanings.sent1: The subagencies in different cities report back to the headquarters.
meanings.sent2: Each subagency focuses on a specific aspect of the business.
meanings.sent3: The subagencies held a bake-off to determine the best division.
meanings.sent4: The subagencies are like the different colors in a rainbow, each adding to the whole.
meanings.sent5: The subagencies act as the arms and legs of the main organization, reaching out to different areas.
